title: FUCK DYNAMIC QUEUE
body:
You have no idea what garbage of a system you created, Riot.

It's your WORST decision you have ever released and I cannot believe we still deal with this.

The amount of boosted players I meet on daily basis is unreal. 

Pro players are so tired of wating 60 min for their queue, they jump on smurfs and destroy our elo.

Thanks Riot for fuckin each and one of us in the ass.

replies.body: I saw a master tier in my que wtf riot

That was probably a plat, considering you are bronze.

Or just a lie, because a plat is pretty unlikely too.
